author: cnbc.com
title: Siegfried Congratulates Sean Maffei on New Leadership Role
text:
WILMINGTON, Del., Feb. 2, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- The Siegfried Group, LLP (Siegfried) is pleased to announce that Sean Maffei was recently promoted to Director in Siegfried's New York Metro Market.
"Sean has played a pivotal role in the growth of our Firm and we are excited for him to continue his success as part of our Leadership team in the Northeast," said Domenica Scarpulla, Regional Market Leader for Siegfried's Northeast region. "His dedication and passion for his clients is evident and his ability to inspire those around him makes him a perfect fit for such an important role at our Firm."
As a Director on Siegfried's National Market Leadership Team, Maffei will continue to serve as a Leadership Advisor for Siegfried's clients, and will focus on business development and building meaningful client relationships in the New York Metro Market.
"It's inspiring to work with such talented individuals every day, whether it's our clients, our Professionals, or our Leadership Team," said Maffei. "I look forward to my new position as a Director at the Firm and I'm excited to be a part of and share in Siegfried's unique entrepreneurial culture."
Maffei earned his Bachelor of Science in corporate finance and accounting from Bentley University and then spent several years in a role with Deloitte. He is a proud member of The Union League Club in Manhattan, and also serves on Bentley University's Alumni Executive Board. In his free time, he enjoys traveling, playing golf, and skiing.
Siegfried congratulates Maffei on his new role as a Director and wishes him well as he continues experiencing transformational growth at the Firm.
More information about Siegfried and its career opportunities is available at siegfriedgroup.com .
About The Siegfried Group, LLP (Siegfried)
Siegfried works alongside financial executives across the nation, on their most important accounting and finance projects. Filled with an innovative spirit and led by an ambitious entrepreneur, Siegfried provides unique Leadership Advisory combined with high potential talent. At the heart of our Firm is our approach to individual leadership and the continual pursuit of helping people grow both personally and professionally. As a whole, we value having fun, being fair, and building and sharing stakeholder value.
